paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation covers the fundamentals of EiffelEnvision projects. It includes information on how and why EiffelEnvision projects are structured the way they are, as well as providing information on how to configure and manage your projects.

structure/index.xml Project Structure
A complete outline of an EiffelEnvision project's structure and layout, including documentation on integrated user interface elements.

adding_projects/index.xml Adding New Projects
Information on what new projects templates are available in EiffelEnvision and how to add them to a Visual Studio .NET solution.

configuring/index.xml Managing Project
Various aspects of EiffelEnvision project configuration to manipulate file management and the compilation process.
